/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear day. Dominating the skyline is a towering skyscraper, its blue glass facade reflecting the sunlight, standing tall amidst a cluster of other buildings. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a low angle that looks up towards the towering skyscraper, lending a sense of grandeur and scale to the scene.
